remarks: Property of a member of the orthocomplement of a subset.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
ocvfval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ocvfval.i $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
ocvfval.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ocvfval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` F ) $.
ocvfval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
ocvi $p |- ( ( A e. ( ._|_ ` S ) /\ B e. S ) -> ( A ., B ) = .0. ) $.
